column3: As a potential customer, I want to find out which plants are easiest to care for so that I can purchase low-maintenance options.
column4:
1) Ability to sort plants by "beginner," "intermediate," and "advanced" 
2) Ability to search for plants with similar care needs

column3: As a plant owner, I want to access care instructions easily so that I can keep my plant alive longer.
column4:
1) Receive plant care leaflet with each order
2) Option to sign up for monthly emails with seasonal care tips

column3: As a plant owner, I want to have the right tools to care for my plant so that I can keep it healthy and beautiful.
column4:
1) Can purchase plant care starter kits (for ferns, succulents, vines, etc.)
2) Option to buy partial kits or single tools

column3: As a plant owner, I want to remember when to water my plants so that I don't under- or overwater them.
column4:
1) Option to sign up for reminder texts or emails
2) Option to add reminder stickers for use with calendars to each order

column3: As a plant owner, I want to get expert help and advice quickly so that I know what to do if my plant gets sick.
column4:
1) Access to live chat support 
2) Longer phone support hours

column3: As a customer, I want a hassle-free way to return my order so that I can be sure I have the right plant for me.
column4:
1) Credit and return FAQ linked on homepage
2) All orders ship with return labels and instructions

column3: As a potential customer, I want to be able to select from a variety of different Bonsai trees so that I can pick the exact type I want.
column4:
1) Ability to select from multiple tree species 
2) Options to sort by species, size, and care requirements

column3: As a customer, I want to know that my tree will be shipped securely so that it arrives in good condition.
column4:
1) Can review graphic explaining packing and shipping process during checkout
2) Signature required when a Bonsai shipment is received

column3: As a new Bonsai tree owner, I want to learn about different Bonsai styles so I can decide which is right for my tree.
column4:
1) Customers can visit a guide to different styles (formal & informal upright, broom, cascade, etc.) on website
2) Customers can take a quiz to match their' trees to suitable styles

column3: As a Bonsai tree owner, I want to have the right tools to care for my tree so I can shape and style it properly.
column4:
1) Option to purchase Bonsai starter kits (shears, wire, mesh, fertilizer, etc.) available for purchase
2) Customers can choose from a selection of premium tools (grafting knives, carving tools, root hooks, etc.)

column3: As a Bonsai tree owner, I want to learn how to shape and style my tree so that I can control its growth.
column4:
1) Can sign up for "Bonsai Basics" online course
2) Can sign up for intermediate styling course
3) Can sign up for advanced techniques online course

column3: As a Bonsai tree owner, I want to learn about the Bonsai history and traditions so that I can better appreciate my tree.
column4:
1) Can purchase booklet on the history of Bonsai in Japan
2) Can purchase booklet Bonsai and Japanese design
